values: 学习；学业；研究；专题研究；调查；专题调查；分析；书房；书斋；工作室；功课；课业；习作；试作；试画
学习；研究；钻研；攻读；细察；端详；细看审视；观察；考察；分析；致力于；专心于；调查；探究；深入了解；仔细考虑

synonym.mean: 学习，研究；课题；书房；学问

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 种马的；为配种而饲养的
散布；用许多饰钮等装饰
用功的；热心的；专心的；故意的；适于学习的

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指作出决策前把问题的各个方面进行比较，权衡利害得失，取有利的方面。
既指一时的对某事的考虑，也指长时间的深入的思考。
普通用词，指对各方面考虑，在制订出计划或采取具体动作之前作认真检查。
通常指长时间思考某事，有时含无确定的实际目的。
侧重仔细、深入、连续地考虑问题，以作出认真的估计和正确的抉择。

word_group.brief_definition: 进一步研究；进一步学习；进一步探讨
个案研究, 案例研究
出神, 沉思默想(以致没注意到周围情况)
比较研究；对比研究；对照研究
本研究中；在此研究中；本研究

bilingual.source: Good learners know the best way they can study.
bilingual.target: 优秀的学习者知道他们能学习的最佳方法。

list.abstract: study，音标[ˈstʌdi]，英语单词。作名词为学习；攻读；研究等。作动词为学习；攻读；研读等。例句：A new study shows that we keep using our old devices well after they go out of style.（一项新的研究表明，即使旧设备过时了，我们也会继续使用它们。） study的近义词为learning，knowledge，research等。
《study》是韩国娱乐公司TOPCLASS Entertainmnet打造的女子组合Stellar于2013年7月11日发表的数字单曲，其社长为神话组合的Eric。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, but we use the Internet to study as well, Mr. Matthews.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是啊，但是我们也用互联网学习啊，马修斯老师。

yingyinNormal.en: Honey, you just need to study more. You're gonna pick your grade up.
yingyinNormal.zh: 亲爱的，你只是需要多多学习，你的成绩会提上来的。

yingyinNormal.en: Understood, detective. Okay, let's see if I got this right. One: after a group study session, Margot, with her car, didn't return home Thursday evening.
yingyinNormal.zh: 明白了，警探。好的，你来听听我说的对不对。一：一次学习小组学习后，玛戈还有她的车在星期四晚上都失踪了。

yingyinNormal.en: I like you so much that when I'm 16, I'll tell you to go study in Sweden if you really want to.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我非常喜欢你，等到了16岁，我会告诉你，如果你真的想去瑞典学习，那就去吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey, honey! Oh hey. Still studying for that test? I can't. I have to study. What time did you get to bed? Sure thing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 亲爱的！还在准备考试吗？不行，我要学习。你几点睡的？当然了。

yingyinNormal.en: What's Margot up to tonight? She's at a study group all night. Wait, all night tonight? Yeah, I just got off the phone with her. She's got a bio final next week. Why?
yingyinNormal.zh: 那个... 玛戈今天在干嘛呢？她跟她的学习小组要通宵学习。通宵吗？泡菜秋葵汤菜谱 嗯 ，我刚跟她通过电话。她下周有生物期末考试。怎么了？

yingyinNormal.en: And each one is scared that the other's gonna steal his shower time or wants to party, when the other wants to study.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们都吓到了对方，因为对方要占用自己的洗澡时间，或者一个在学习的时候，另一个要开派对。

yingyinNormal.en: They were always attentive and respectful, when I tell them about what it was like for me, growing up in a Chinese household with strict parents who made me study.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们总是很照顾人，尊重人，当我给他们讲我的故事，在中国人的家庭中长大，有非常严格的父母总是让我学习。

yingyinNormal.en: The Heir alone would be able to open the Chamber and unleash the horror within, and by so doing purge the school of all those who in Slytherin's view, were unworthy to study magic.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这个传人将会打开那个密室，释放出里面恐怖的东西，到那个时候便能除掉学校中所有的斯莱特林认为没有资格学习魔法的人。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets》

yingyinNormal.en: All right, on Thursday evening, she attended a study group for her biology class. Do you know anything about that? She's probably in AP Bio, right? Yes, she is. Yeah, no, I'm in regular.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好的，礼拜四晚上，她参加了生物课的学习小组。你知道吗？她应该是在预修生物的班，对吧？对，她是。嗯，我在上普通生物。

yingyinNormal.en: What about study group? Do you know who hosted that? I took bio last year, so, no. No idea. She and I were on different AP paths, so it was kinda hard to keep tabs. But you guys were friends.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那学习小组呢？你知道在谁家办的吗？我去年就选生物课了，所以，我不知道。不清楚。我跟她选了不同的预修课，所以很难一直关注她。但你们是朋友。

yingyinNormal.en: What kind of birds did he study?
yingyinNormal.zh: 他研究的是什么样的鸟？

yingyinNormal.en: I loved that study the moment I read it. Ironic?
yingyinNormal.zh: 那个研究我当时看了就特别喜欢。格外讽刺吧？

yingyinNormal.en: What'd you study? Economics. I studied economics.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你学什么专业？经济学。我读的是经济学。

yingyinNormal.en: So, Amy, what's going on with your addiction study?
yingyinNormal.zh: 艾米，你的上瘾研究怎么样了？

yingyinNormal.en: My sister preferred to study Dominion Over Living Things.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我姐姐喜欢研究如何统治世界。

yingyinNormal.en: It's great. It's a wonderful thing, when you study sociology you study sociology.
yingyinNormal.zh: 很好，没问题当你研究社会学你就只研究社会学。

yingyinNormal.en: So the real goal of behavioral economics is to say when you study economics you study economics.
yingyinNormal.zh: 行为经济学真正的目标是当你研究经济学你就只研究经济学。

yingyinNormal.en: Daddy Pig is hard at work in the study. Daddy Pig, this study is a complete mess. It's not that bad.
yingyinNormal.zh: 猪爸爸正在书房里努力的工作。我说猪爸爸，你的这间书房真的都是太乱了。没有你说的那么乱吧。

yingyinNormal.en: What do you study? I don't have a major yet. But like what do you want to study? I don't really know. I don't know yet.
yingyinNormal.zh: 学什么呢？我还没有专业呢。那你想学什么？不知道，还不知道呢。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 背台词; 背台词的演员
研究对象; 研究问题

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 慎重的；深思熟虑的；经过思考的

word_family.mean: n. 学习；攻读；研究；调查；探讨；书房；书斋；习作；试作；试画；化身；榜样；模范

sense_info_list.en: investigate and analyze a subject or situation in detail

examination_example.sentence: A recent annual <highlight>study</highlight> of countries and their ability to convert growth into well-being sheds some light on that question.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最近一项关于国家及其将增长转化为福祉的能力的年度研究对这个问题有所启发。

examination_example.sentence: A new <highlight>study</highlight> suggests that contrary to most surveys, people are actually more stressed at home than at work.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一项新的研究表明，与大多数调查相反，人们实际上在家里比在工作中更有压力。

examination_example.sentence: But a comparative <highlight>study</highlight> of linguistic traits published online today supplies a reality check.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但如今在网上公布的语言特征的比较研究给出了真实的检验。

sense_info_list.en: acquire academic knowledge at an educational establishment

examination_example.sentence: Suppose you are going to <highlight>study</highlight> abroad and share an apartment with John, a local student.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 假设你要出国留学，和当地的学生约翰合租一套公寓。

examination_example.sentence: The report also advocates greater <highlight>study</highlight> of foreign languages, international affairs and the expansion of <highlight>study</highlight> abroad programs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该报告还提倡更多地学习外语、国际事务和扩大留学项目。

examination_example.sentence: One idea is to allow people to <highlight>study</highlight> law as an undergraduate degree.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一个主意是允许人们将法律作为本科学位来学习。

sense_info_list.en: a room used or designed for reading, writing, or academic work
(of an actor) try to learn the words of one's role
sense_info_list.zh: 背台词; 背台词的演员

sense_info_list.en: look at closely in order to observe or read
an academic book or article on a particular topic, especially a drawing or a musical composition
a thing or person that is an embodiment or good example of something
the object or aim of one's endeavors
sense_info_list.zh: 研究对象; 研究问题

word_usage.usage: study指学习；研究仔细检查时，是不可数名词，studies做复数名词是指功课；课业；学业，还可以用于某些学科名称，如：media studies传媒学、business studies商学。

study指花费时间阅读、上课等以学习学科知识，侧重学习的过程；也指仔细观察以研究某事物；learn通常指通过学习、练习或由别人教授以获得某种知识或技能，侧重学习的成果。
例： I am learning to skate. 我在学习滑冰。
        Physicists are now studying cosmic rays. 物理学家正在研究宇宙射线。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: investigate and analyze a subject or situation in detail

examination_example.sentence: Many <highlight>studies</highlight> have found that feelings and thoughts don't necessarily predict behavior.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 很多研究发现，感觉和看法不一定能预测行为。

examination_example.sentence: It's a welcome change that people are <highlight>studying</highlight> instead the future of intelligence.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们正在研究未来而不是智能，因而这是一个可喜的变化。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>study</highlight> found that pasta didn't contribute to weight gain or increase in body fat.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究发现，意大利面不会增加体重或增加体内脂肪。

sense_info_list.en: acquire academic knowledge at an educational establishment

examination_example.sentence: In a word, I hope everyone puts their <highlight>studies</highlight>, work and life before chasing stars.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 总而言之，我希望每个人都把学习、工作和生活放在追星之前。

examination_example.sentence: If we're going to force taxpayers to foot the bill for college degrees, students should only <highlight>study</highlight> those subjects that're of greatest benefit to taxpayers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果我们要强迫纳税人为大学学位买单，学生们应该只学习那些对纳税人最有益的科目。

sense_info_list.en: a written document describing the findings of some individual or group

examination_example.sentence: Hillary Shulman, the author of the <highlight>study</highlight>, asserts that specialized words are a signal.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这项研究的作者希拉里·舒尔曼断言，专业词汇是一种信号。

sense_info_list.en: a room used or designed for reading, writing, or academic work
used in the title of an academic subject
study as pursued by one person

word_usage.usage: study作名词“学习”时，可以用作the study of sth.、studies in sth.、sth. studies等，但很少说sth. study。
study作名词“研究的成果”时，后跟介词of或in。
make a study of 表示“研究，观察”，其中make不能用do代替。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: investigate and analyze a subject or situation in detail

examination_example.sentence: A review of 54 <highlight>studies</highlight> found that eating breakfast can improve memory, though the effects on other brain functions were inconclusive.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一篇对54项研究的文献综合分析发现，吃早餐可以改善记忆，但对大脑其他功能的影响尚无定论。

examination_example.sentence: A review of 54 <highlight>studies</highlight> found that there is no consensus yet on what type of breakfast is healthier, and concluded that the type of breakfast doesn't matter as much as simply eating something.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一篇对54项研究的文献综合分析发现，对于哪种类型的早餐更健康，人们还没有达成共识，并且该论文认为，早餐的类型，远不如吃早餐这件事本身来得重要。

examination_example.sentence: According to the same <highlight>study</highlight>, efforts to reduce consumption should focus on improving consumer awareness and behaviour.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据同一项研究，减少微波炉用电的努力应聚焦于提高消费者意识、改善其消费行为。

examination_example.sentence: Confronted with this evidence, several bottled-water manufacturers including Nestle and Coca-Cola undertook their own <highlight>studies</highlight> using the same methodology.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 面对这一证据，包括雀巢和可口可乐在内的几家瓶装水制造商采用同样的方法进行了自己的研究。

examination_example.sentence: In a 2011 USPS case <highlight>study</highlight>, the agency emphasized its massive infrastructure as a "unique federal asset" to be called upon in a disaster or terrorist attack.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在2011年美国邮政的一份案例研究中，该机构强调其庞大的基础设施是在灾难或恐怖袭击中需要调用的一份“独特的联邦资产。”

examination_example.sentence: Many scientists have <highlight>studied</highlight> green sea slugs to confirm that they are actually able to create energy from sunlight.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多科学家对绿海姑蚧进行了研究，以证实它们确实能够从太阳光中获取能量。

examination_example.sentence: Europe's stock of these quick-cooking ovens emit as much carbon as nearly 7 million cars, a new <highlight>study</highlight> has found.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一项新的研究发现，欧洲已有的这种微波炉加热方式存储的可释放的二氧化碳量相当于近700万辆汽车的排放量。

examination_example.sentence: Prior to the new <highlight>study</highlight>, little was known about the risks of getting directly infected by common respiratory viruses, such as the flu or common cold, on an airplane, the researchers said.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究人员说，在这项新研究之前，人们对在飞机上直接感染诸如流感或普通感冒等常见呼吸道病毒的风险知之甚少。

examination_example.sentence: So, to evaluate the risks of infection, the <highlight>study</highlight> team flew on 10 different flights in the U.S. during the flu season.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此，为了评估感染的风险，研究小组在流感季节期间在美国乘坐了10个不同的航班。

examination_example.sentence: The projects included in the <highlight>study</highlight> raised S4000 on average, with 30% receiving less than $1000.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这项研究中的项目平均筹集了4000美元，其中30%的项目不到1000美元。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>study</highlight> was conducted at the State University of New York on behalf of Orb Media, a journalism organization.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这项研究是由纽约州立大学代表一家新闻机构Orb Media进行的。

examination_example.sentence: There are a lot of <highlight>studies</highlight> on the relationship between breakfast eating and possible health outcomes, but this may be because those who eat breakfast choose to habitually have health-enhancing behaviours such as regular exercise and not smoking.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 关于吃早餐与可能的健康结果之间的关联，有很多研究，但这可能是因为那些吃早餐的人通常会选择有益健康的习惯和行为，比如不抽烟、经常做运动。

examination_example.sentence: Those who added dessert lost an average of 40 pounds more — however, the <highlight>study</highlight> was unable to show the long-term effects.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那些加入了甜点的，平均减掉了40磅，不过，这项研究无法证实其长期效果。

examination_example.sentence: To find out, researchers designed a <highlight>study</highlight> in which 52 obese women took part in a 12-week weight loss programme.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了找到答案，科学家设计了一项研究，让52名肥胖女性参与一个为期12周的减肥计划。

examination_example.sentence: A global <highlight>study</highlight> looked at the average height of 18-year-olds in 200 countries 1914 and 2014.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一项全球研究考察了200个国家1914年和2014年18岁青少年的平均身高。

examination_example.sentence: A new <highlight>study</highlight> finds that the risk of divorce among older couples rises when the wife-not the husband- becomes seriously ill.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一项新的研究发现，年长夫妇中，当妻子(而不是丈夫)身患重病时，离婚风险会上升。

examination_example.sentence: In general, the <highlight>study</highlight> found that undergraduates were almost as likely as old people to make this mistake and men as likely as women.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 总的来说，研究发现，大学生几乎和老人一样会犯这个错误，男人和女人犯错概率也一样。

examination_example.sentence: Karraker and co-author Kenzie Latham analyzed 20 years of data on 2, 717 marriages from a <highlight>study</highlight> conducted by Indiana University since 1992.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Karraker 和论文合著者 Kenzie Latham 对2717桩婚姻中20年的数据进行了分析，这些数据来自印第安纳大学自1992年以来开张的一项研究。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>study</highlight> also found that within that group, misnamings occurred where the names shared initial or internal sounds, like Jimmy and Joanie or John and Bob.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该研究还发现，在一个关系池里，当名字的开头或中间发音相同时，就会发生喊错名字的情况，比如Jimmy和Joanie，或者John和Bob。

examination_example.sentence: While the <highlight>study</highlight> didn't assess why divorce in more likely when wives but not husbands become seriously ill, Karraker offers a few possible reasons.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然这项研究并未对妻子(而非丈夫)患病时离婚概率更高的原因做出评定，但 Karraker 提供了几个可能的原因。

examination_example.sentence: While they sound efficient and cost-saving, a recent <highlight>study</highlight> reports that they are not effective, primarily because depressed patients are not likely to engage with them or stick with them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然这些线上项目听起来既高效又节省成本，但最近的一项研究表明事实并非如此，主要因为抑郁症患者不太可能配合参与或者一直坚持下去。

examination_example.sentence: According to a newly published <highlight>study</highlight>, cats seem to be able to predict the location of hiding prey (猎物) using both their ears and an inborn (天生的) understanding of how the physical world works.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据一项最新发表的研究，猫咪似乎能够利用它们的耳朵和对物理世界运作的天生理解来预测隐藏的猎物的位置。

examination_example.sentence: Does the <highlight>study</highlight> mean that cats will soon grasp the ins and outs of cause and effect?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这项研究是否意味着猫咪很快就会掌握因果关系的来龙去脉？

examination_example.sentence: In 2007, my lab at Clemson University published a <highlight>study</highlight> in the Journal of Applied Microbiology.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 2007年，我在克莱姆森大学的实验室在《应用微生物学杂志》上发表了一项研究。

examination_example.sentence: Last year, a <highlight>study</highlight> from Aston University in the UK used nearly identical parameters (参数) to our <highlight>study</highlight> and found similar results.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 去年，英国阿斯顿大学的一项研究使用了与我们的研究几乎相同的参数，并发现了类似的结果。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Studies</highlight> have explored evidence that dietary changes can slow inflammation (炎症) , for example, or make the body inhospitable to cancer cells.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究已经找出证据，证明饮食结构的变化可以减缓炎症反应，比如，或者使人体不适用于癌细胞。

examination_example.sentence: Living in an urban area with green spaces has a long-lasting positive impact on people's mental well-being, a <highlight>study</highlight> has suggested.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一项研究表明，生活在绿色区域对人们的心理健康有着持久的积极影响。

examination_example.sentence: Some <highlight>studies</highlight> have found that first-born children are more intelligent than their later-born siblings (兄弟姐妹) .
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有研究发现，最先出生的孩子要比后来出生的弟弟妹妹们更聪明。

sense_info_list.en: acquire academic knowledge at an educational establishment

examination_example.sentence: Research into what students learn in school has found just how much is missing in their <highlight>studies</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对学生在校学习情况的研究发现，他们的学习中缺少了多少东西。

examination_example.sentence: Students of color are more engaged and earn better grades when they see themselves in their <highlight>studies</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当有色人种学生在学习中看到自己时，他们会更投入，并获得更好的成绩。

examination_example.sentence: The arguments against physical education have included concerns that gym time may be taking away from <highlight>study</highlight> time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 反对体育教育的理由包括担心健身时间可能会占用学习时间。

sense_info_list.en: used in the title of an academic subject

examination_example.sentence: The Center for Coastal <highlight>Studies</highlight> said that its aerial survey team spotted a mum with two babies .
examination_example.sentence_trans: 海岸研究中心说，他们的航空勘测队发现一位带着两个婴儿的母亲。

examination_example.sentence: An Asian-American <highlight>studies</highlight> professor placed greater emphasis on teacher training than on teachers' background.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一位研究美国亚裔的教授更重视对教师的培训，而不是教师的背景。

examination_example.sentence: His 2016 study of K-12 social <highlight>studies</highlight> textbooks and teacher manuals found that Asian Americans were poorly represented at best, and subjected to racist caricatures (拙劣的模仿) at worst.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他在2016年对K-12社会研究教科书和教师手册的研究发现，亚裔美国人在最好的情况下代表性不足，在最坏的情况下遭受种族主义漫画的攻击。

sense_info_list.en: look at closely in order to observe or read
a room used or designed for reading; writing; or academic work

word_usage.usage: make a study of 表示“研究，观察”，其中make不能用do代替。
study作名词“学习”时，可以用作the study of sth.、studies in sth.、sth. studies等，但很少说sth. study。
study作名词“研究的成果”时，后跟介词of或in。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Dogs may indeed be able to distinguish between happy and angry human faces, according to a new <highlight>study</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据一项新的研究，狗也许真的能够区分人类高兴和愤怒的表情。

examination_example.sentence: It is our hope that advances in science will offer new perspectives (视角) from which to <highlight>study</highlight> how people manage their lives.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们希望，科学的进步将提供新的视角来研究人们如何管理他们的生活。

examination_example.sentence: Recently, people have begun <highlight>studying</highlight> the connection between the natural world and healing (治愈).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最近，人们开始研究自然界和治疗之间的关联。

examination_example.sentence: Applicants in technical assignments must have reached the last year of their <highlight>studies</highlight> in a technical institution.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从事技术工作的申请人必须已经到了在技术院校学习的最后一年。

examination_example.sentence: You are <highlight>studying</highlight> in a graduate program for a master's degree.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你正在攻读硕士学位的研究生课程。

examination_example.sentence: When I <highlight>studied</highlight> chemistry in high school, I reconsidered my goal and decided to be a doctor.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我在高中学习化学时，我重新考虑了我的目标，并决定成为一名医生。

examination_example.sentence: You have completed your full-time university <highlight>studies</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你已完成全日制大学课程。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 进一步研究；进一步学习；进一步探讨

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 慎重的；深思熟虑的；经过思考的

word_family.mean: n. 学习；攻读；研究；调查；探讨；书房；书斋；习作；试作；试画；化身；榜样；模范

sense_info_list.en: acquire academic knowledge at an educational establishment

examination_example.sentence: I am glad to learn that you have been chosen to <highlight>study</highlight> in China.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我很高兴得知你被选中去中国学习。

examination_example.sentence: Later I <highlight>studied</highlight> on my own as well, but my progress was still slow.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 后来我也自学了，但是我的进步还是很慢。

examination_example.sentence: I'm considering going abroad for further <highlight>study</highlight>, but I haven't decided yet.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我正在考虑出国深造，但我还没有决定。

sense_info_list.en: investigate and analyze a subject or situation in detail

examination_example.sentence: The new kind of hybrid rice is worth <highlight>studying</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种新型杂交水稻值得研究。

examination_example.sentence: It allowed him to see and <highlight>study</highlight> the environment in detail.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这使他能够详细地观察和研究环境。

examination_example.sentence: This is the first <highlight>study</highlight> that shows the association between long-term exposure to green space and brain structure.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是第一项表明长期接触绿色空间与大脑结构之间联系的研究。

sense_info_list.en: a room used or designed for reading, writing, or academic work

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>study</highlight> was designed only for children.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这个书房是专为儿童设计的。

examination_example.sentence: Father's voice came out from the <highlight>study</highlight>, loud and angry.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 父亲的声音从书房里传出，大声且愤怒。

sense_info_list.en: study as pursued by one person

examination_example.sentence: Girls would otherwise have been unable to continue their <highlight>studies</highlight> after completing their nine years of education.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 否则女孩们在完成九年教育后将无法继续学业。

examination_example.sentence: She is very busy with her <highlight>studies</highlight> at weekends.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她周末忙于学业。

word_usage.usage: study作名词“学习”时，可以用作the study of sth.、studies in sth.、sth. studies等，但很少说sth. study。
study作名词“研究的成果”时，后跟介词of或in。
make a study of 表示“研究，观察”，其中make不能用do代替。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 通常指通过学习、练习或由别人教授以获得某种知识或技能，侧重学习的成果。
指花费时间阅读、上课等以学习学科知识，侧重学习的过程；也指仔细观察以研究某事物。
